name: QZAntics Chug For Windows
short_description:
QZAntics Chug For Windows is the first in a line of programs intended for the practical joker and mischief maker.

QZAntics Chug For Windows is a very simple program which allocates and locks all available memory on the system it is running and doesn't stop until the program has been terminated or caused a complete system crash.

Just imagine 'Pac Man'.

Wocka wocka wocka wocka...

On a more somber note. It's a GREAT way to stress test real time application processes (ie: Spaceship Two Flight Systems) should an errant parallel process or bad design cause a problem with adjacent processes.
summary: Chug allocates and locks all available memory on the system
